protocol_name: Non-rigid point cloud registration based lung motion estimation using tangent-plane distance
protocol_name_html: Non-rigid point cloud registration based lung motion estimation using tangent-plane distance
protocol_affiliation: Huazhong University of Science and Technology
affiliation: Huazhong University of Science and Technology
manuscript_citation: Rao F, Li W, Yin Z (2018) Non-rigid point cloud registration based lung motion estimation using tangent-plane distance. PLoS ONE 13(9): e0204492. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0204492

authors_list.name: Fan Rao
authors_list.affiliation: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

authors_list.name: Wen-long Li
authors_list.affiliation: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

authors_list.name: Zhou-ping Yin
authors_list.affiliation: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"3br","text":"Extract dense point clouds F and R from 4DCT images at different phases, and they represent the status of lung surface at different time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2hon3","text":"Simplify point cloud F to point cloud F\u2018. The scale of F\u2019 should be around 4000.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8aai1","text":"Calculate the connectivity matrix M from point cloud F\u2018.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"avi9d","text":"Calculate the normal vector information N from point cloud R.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d1j60","text":"Simplify point cloud R and its normal vector information N to R\u2018 and N\u2018. The scale of R\u2018 should be around 6000.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2saph","text":"Bring point cloud F\u2018, connectivity matrix M, point cloud R\u2018 and normal vector information N\u2018 to the non-rigid registration procedure, and let F\u2018, R\u2018 denote the source point cloud and target point cloud respectively.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
{"blocks":[{"key":"epd9j","text":"Initial the weight value \u03b1 and the stiffness matrix G.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"53ksp","text":"Calculate the the derivative of the objective function to the transformation parameters and update the local affine transformation parameters using stochastic gradient descent optimization. Repeat until a convergence criteria is met.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"73s4r","text":"Output the local affine transformation parameters and the transformed points.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
